fields.label: API Connection
fields.description: Connect to your Browser Use API account.

fields.label: Scheduled Task ID
fields.description: ID of the scheduled task to update.

fields.label: Task Instructions
fields.description: Instructions for what the agent should do.

fields.label: Schedule Type
fields.description: Type of schedule: interval or cron.

fields.label: Interval Minutes
fields.description: Minutes between runs (required for interval schedule).

fields.label: Minute
fields.description: Minute (0-59) for cron schedule.

fields.label: Hour
fields.description: Hour (0-23) for cron schedule.

fields.label: Day of Month
fields.description: Day of month (1-31) for cron schedule.

fields.label: Month
fields.description: Month (1-12) for cron schedule.

fields.label: Day of Week
fields.description: Day of week (0-7, where 0 and 7 are Sunday) for cron schedule.

fields.label: Cron Expression
fields.description: Cron expression for scheduling.

fields.label: Start At
fields.description: When to start the schedule (ISO 8601 format).

fields.label: End At
fields.description: When to end the schedule (ISO 8601 format).

fields.label: Is Active
fields.description: Whether the scheduled task is active.

fields.label: Use Adblock
fields.description: Whether to use an adblocker.

fields.label: Use Proxy
fields.description: Whether to use a proxy.

fields.label: Highlight Elements
fields.description: Whether to highlight elements on the page.

fields.label: LLM Model
fields.description: LLM model to use.

fields.label: Save Browser Data
fields.description: Whether to save browser cookies and data between runs.

fields.label: Structured Output JSON
fields.description: JSON schema for structured output.
